column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"There are some really rare abilities out there, but they won't always be part of a weapon you seek."
"That's why you've got to add abilities. You take something special from one item, and give it to another."
"The more you do it, the lower your success rate, but hey, the reward is worth the risk."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the old days, when I tried to affix my... "
